statements: SELECT user_id, content_id, content_text, content_timestamp FROM user_content;
SELECT content_text, user_id, content_timestamp, content_id FROM user_content;
SELECT content_id, content_timestamp, user_id, content_text FROM user_content;
SELECT content_text, content_timestamp, user_id, content_id FROM user_content;
SELECT * FROM user_content ORDER BY content_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, content_id, content_text, content_timestamp FROM user_content WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, content_id FROM user_content WHERE content_id = 10 ORDER BY content_timestamp DESC;
SELECT content_text FROM user_content WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND content_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY content_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_content WHERE content_text LIKE '%example%' AND content_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY user_id DESC, content_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, content_id, content_timestamp FROM user_content WHERE content_text IS NOT NULL AND content_id < 100 ORDER BY content_id DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, content FROM user_content WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT challenge_name, challenge_description FROM challenges WHERE challenge_difficulty > 5;
SELECT content_id, content FROM user_content WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT challenge_id, challenge_description, challenge_difficulty FROM challenges ORDER BY challenge_difficulty DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_content JOIN challenges ON user_content.content_id = challenges.challenge_id;
SELECT * FROM user_content WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT challenge_name, challenge_difficulty FROM challenges WHERE challenge_difficulty > 5
SELECT content_id, content, created_at FROM user_content WHERE created_at >= '2023-01-01'
SELECT user_id, content FROM user_content WHERE content LIKE '%important%'
SELECT * FROM challenges ORDER BY challenge_difficulty DESC
SELECT * FROM user_generated_content;
SELECT content_id, content FROM user_generated_content WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT challenge_name, difficulty_level, reward_points FROM challenges WHERE difficulty_level > 3;
SELECT * FROM community_interactions WHERE interaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT content_id, user_id, interaction_type FROM community_interactions WHERE content_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM user_generated_content WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT content_id, content FROM user_generated_content WHERE content LIKE '%example%' AND created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT challenge_name, reward_points FROM challenges WHERE difficulty_level > 3 ORDER BY reward_points DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM community_interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM user_generated_content uc JOIN community_interactions ci ON uc.content_id = ci.content_id WHERE ci.user_id = 2 AND uc.created_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM challenges WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM community_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT u.username, c.content_text, c.created_at FROM users u INNER JOIN content c ON u.user_id = c.user_id WHERE c.content_text LIKE '%example%'
SELECT challenge_name, start_date FROM challenges ORDER BY start_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM community_interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(interaction_id) > 2
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT challenge_name, creation_date FROM challenges ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, participation_date FROM challenge_participants WHERE challenge_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT challenge_name, description FROM challenges WHERE creation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY challenge_name;

SELECT users.username, challenges.challenge_name, interactions.interaction_type FROM users JOIN interactions ON users.user_id = interactions.user_id JOIN challenges ON interactions.user_id = challenges.creator_id;
SELECT users.username, comments.comment_text FROM users JOIN comments ON users.user_id = comments.user_id WHERE comments.comment_date >= '2022-02-01' ORDER BY comments.comment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT challenge_name, COUNT(user_id) AS participants_count FROM challenge_participants GROUP BY challenge_id HAVING participants_count >= 3 ORDER BY participants_count DESC;
